name: Shiro

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A Sub DPS with great AOE capabilities thanks to her bouncing chakrams. She gets very powerful team-wide skill cooldown reset at her 3rd advancement.

skills.name: Rapid Throw
skills.description:
While on the ground, brandish the chakram to unleash 5 spinning attacks.

  • First Attack: Deal damage equal to 30.7% of ATK + 2.
  • Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 23.8% of ATK + 1.
  • Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 34% of ATK + 2.
  • Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 30.7% of ATK + 2.
  • Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 53.8% of ATK + 3 and knock the target back a short distance.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, tap normal attack to unleash 3 spinning attacks in a row.

  • First Attack: Deal damage equal to 26.2% of ATK + 1.
  • Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 29.2% of ATK + 2.
  • Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 37.2% of ATK + 2.

skills.name: Scatter
skills.description:
After the second normal attack, hold attack button to activate Scatter.

Fire five penetrating chakrams forward, each hit dealing 43.5% of ATK + 2 damage, with minor knockback.

skills.name: Air Spin
skills.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Air Spin.

Unleash a powerful strike, dealing damage equal to 191.5% of ATK + 10 to the target and nearby enemies, and suspend them.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then tap normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 427.5% of ATK + 23.

skills.name: Waning Moon
skills.description:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Waning Moon.

Toss a spinning chakram forward, dealing damage equal to 132.9% of ATK + 7 to the target and inflicting a stun effect for 0.5 seconds. The chakram then splits into 3 and keeps traveling, dealing damage equal to 24.2% of ATK + 1 to targets along their path. Split chakrams will bounce during Full Bloom.

skills.name: Full Bloom
skills.description:
Create a Chakram Domain with the Wanderer at the center for 8 seconds. At the same time, enemies are pulled in, and their speed is reduced by 30% for 8 seconds. Fire 5 chakrams that bounce between enemies, dealing damage equal to 24.2% of ATK + 1 to targets along their paths, bouncing up to 5 times.

The split chakrams triggered by Waning Moon will also bounce up to 5 times.

Cooldown: 45 seconds.

skills.name: Spirit of the Air
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder and unleashes Chkram of the Seas at a target. Struck target causes AOE stun for 1 second, plus 1 attack each against up to 3 units every second (each attack has 10% chance of stunning the target for 1.5 seconds) dealing 41.4% of ATK + 2 damage for 10 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Grievous
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will inflict damage equal to 137% of ATK with the next attack, and make the target grievous for 7 seconds, taking 20% extra damage.

advancement: Increase damage dealt to and all elemental shattering effects on targets within Full Bloom's range by 30%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.

Increase shatter by 15% and reset all weapon skill cooldowns upon shattering the target's shield.

Can only be triggered once every 30 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Attacking a grievous target extends the duration of grievous by an additional 7 seconds (only takes effect once for the same effect).
After using Full Bloom, grant a 100% crit chance for the next 8 seconds.

traits.name: Security Alert
traits.description:
When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by 10% and physical ATK by an additional 7% for 8 seconds.

Cooldown: 16 seconds.

traits.name: Red Alarm
traits.description:
When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by 16% and physical ATK by an additional 10% for 8 seconds.

Cooldown: 16 seconds.
